org.jerkar.api.java
Class JkResourceProcessor.JkInterpolator

java.lang.Object
  org.jerkar.api.java.JkResourceProcessor.JkInterpolator
Enclosing class:
JkResourceProcessor
public static class JkResourceProcessor.JkInterpolator
extends java.lang.Object

Defines values to be interpolated (replacing ${key} by their value), and the file filter to apply it.

Method Summary
 JkResourceProcessor.JkInterpolator and(java.lang.String key, java.lang.String value, java.lang.String... others)
          Returns a copy of this JkResourceProcessor.JkInterpolator but adding key values to interpolate
static JkResourceProcessor.JkInterpolator of(JkPathFilter filter, java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> map)
          Creates a JkInterpolator with the specified filter and key/values to replace.
static JkResourceProcessor.JkInterpolator of(JkPathFilter filter, java.lang.String key, java.lang.String value, java.lang.String... others)
          Same as of(JkPathFilter, Map) but you can specify key values in line.
static JkResourceProcessor.JkInterpolator of(java.lang.String includeFilter, java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> map)
          Same as of(JkPathFilter, Map) but you can specify key values in line.
static JkResourceProcessor.JkInterpolator of(java.lang.String includeFilter, java.lang.String key, java.lang.String value, java.lang.String... others)
          Same as of(JkPathFilter, String, String, String...) but specify an include pattern that will be used as the path filter.
